description: This table contains the user-entered durable medical equipment (DME) information for Home Health episodes. It contains a list of the DMEs that are applicable to a specific patient for a specific episode. This information is entered on the Home Health Remote Client and in the Referral Info 2 form in Intake.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DME_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the DME category list selection for the episode. This column links to category table ZC_DME.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: DME_START_DT
columns.description: This column stores the DME start date for the episode.

columns.name: DME_END_DT
columns.description: This column stores the DME end date for the episode.

columns.name: DME_COMMENTS
columns.description: This column stores comments entered by a user for the DME for the episode.

columns.name: DME_DELETED_YN
columns.description:
This column stores deleted DME information.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: DME_ORDER_ID
columns.description: This item stores the most recent LVO ID linked to the DME in the related line.

columns.name: DME_POC_CSN
columns.description: This item stores the CSN of the current Plan of Care the DME is on.

columns.name: HSPC_COVERED_C_NAME
columns.description:
The durable medical equipment - hospice coverage category ID for the episode.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Covered


Not Covered

columns.name: HSPC_NONCVRD_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The durable medical equipment - hospice not covered reason category ID for the episode.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Other
